alert.note: Alert for Maries (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 3:53PM CDT until July 17 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Maries County in central Missouri... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 353 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Freeburg, or 12 miles south of Linn, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Belle, Vienna and Vichy. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
